    • Method Detail

      • giveAdminRole

        public boolean giveAdminRole​(UserModel caller,
                             GroupModel group,
                             UserModel target)
        If the caller has permission, they will give the target admin role in the specified group
        Parameters:
        caller - the caller thats calling this function
        group - the group that the caller has admin privilege
        target - the target that is getting the admin role
        Returns:
        whether the target was successfully assigned the role or not

      • removeAdminRole

        public boolean removeAdminRole​(UserModel caller,
                               GroupModel group,
                               UserModel target)
                        throws NoAdminException
        If the caller has permission, they will remove the target's admin role in the specified group
        Parameters:
        caller - the caller thats calling this function
        group - the group that the caller has admin privilege
        target - the target that is losing the admin role
        Returns:
        whether the target's role was successfully removed the role or not
        Throws:
        NoAdminException - if there's only one admin and that admin is trying to remove his admin role, then throw this error because there has to always be at least one admin

      • giveModRole

        public boolean giveModRole​(UserModel caller,
                           GroupModel group,
                           UserModel target)
        If the caller has permission, they will give the target mod role in the specified group
        Parameters:
        caller - the caller thats calling this function
        group - the group that the caller has mod privilege
        target - the target that is getting the mod role
        Returns:
        whether the target was successfully assigned the role or not

      • removeModRole

        public boolean removeModRole​(UserModel caller,
                             GroupModel group,
                             UserModel target)
        Remove mod role of a user in a group
        Parameters:
        caller - the caller thats calling this function
        group - the group that the target is a mod in
        target - the user who's mod role is going to get removed
        Returns:
        Whether the removal process was successful or not

      • acceptJoinRequest

        public boolean acceptJoinRequest​(UserModel caller,
                                 GroupModel group,
                                 UserModel target)
        If the caller has permission, they will accept a user's join group request and make them a member
        Parameters:
        caller - the caller thats calling this function
        group - the group that the caller has privilege in
        target - the target that requested to join the group
        Returns:
        whether the target was successfully added as a member or not

      • rejectJoinRquest

        public boolean rejectJoinRquest​(UserModel caller,
                                GroupModel group,
                                UserModel target)
        If the caller has permission, they will reject a user's join group request and make them a member
        Parameters:
        caller - the caller thats calling this function
        group - the group that the caller has privilege in
        target - the target that requested to join the group
        Returns:
        whether the target was successfully rejected or not

      • banUser

        public boolean banUser​(UserModel caller,
                       GroupModel group,
                       UserModel target)
        Ban a user and add them to the banned list, also add the group to the user's bannedFromGroup list
        Parameters:
        caller - the caller that called this function
        group - the group the target is banned from
        target - the user that is getting banned
        Returns:
        whether the ban was successfully delivered or not

      • unbanUser

        public boolean unbanUser​(UserModel caller,
                         GroupModel group,
                         UserModel target)
        Un-Ban a user and remove them to the banned list, also remove the group from the user's bannedFromGroup list
        Parameters:
        caller - the caller that called this function
        group - the group the target was banned from
        target - the user that is getting their ban removed
        Returns:
        whether the ban was successfully removed or not
